Reviews.Title: VERY INTERESTING!
Reviews.Author: KanTuRa
Reviews.Content: I have bought this phone for a present to my brother living abroad of U.S.A.First, It ordered it as "Iphone 4", they sent it in "Iphone 4S" box.I checked it it was Ok and It was Iphone 4, I didn't understand why they sent a Iphone 4 with a box of Iphone 4S.Also there was no paper in the box, just phone.Then, the registry office to passport abroad, said that: This phone has two different IMEI numbers inside and also was entered a username before.I must have been "brand new", musn't it?At the end of story, I got an e-mail my brother, it says these...I am very shame on me.If I had enough time to return this phone, I would do this.But there was a plane to catch.I am not happy with this phone.

Reviews.Title: Don't believe the hype
Reviews.Author: Rob Kj
Reviews.Content: When you get shipped the wrong item in the wrong box... as soon as you open it, this vendor will hide behind his return policy of "Once opened, it's yours". Enjoy all the post's he's going to make to bury a negative review.

Reviews.Title: False advertisement!
Reviews.Author: christie
Reviews.Content: I had to take my iPhone to the apple store because when i received my iPhone, the flash on the camera didn't work. They took it to the back of to open it up and see what was going on, only they couldn't do anything because under the screen, there was little to no apple technology under it. All of the apple things were replaced. I'm returning this product i received as soon as i can

Reviews.Title: Glad I read the reviews before purchasing from this seller
Reviews.Author: virginia
Reviews.Content: I was going to buy this phone but after reading all the negative reviews for this seller I cancelled my order...

Reviews.Title: gift
Reviews.Author: Noor Wouters
Reviews.Content: I was given this as a gift and it didn't work. The Apple store could not help me either as the guts of the phone were not genuine Apple circuits. Buyer Beware.

Reviews.Title: damage
Reviews.Author: Vivi
Reviews.Content: I bought a new iphone 4 unlocked, so I went to my country to use it, it is defective.It doesn't work properly.I would like to have one that is new.I don't want to returned it, just want a new one, like I bought it.

Reviews.Title: Great

Reviews.Content: My iPhone was stolen and this replacement is perfect for all my needs. I find I use it even more than my ipad because of the convenient size.

Reviews.Title: Would not recommend it!

Reviews.Content: It stopped working abruptly without any warning. Thank God the warranty hasn't expired. I have sent for instructions to return it.

Reviews.Title: Very Good iPhone
Reviews.Author: Alberto
Reviews.Content: I get this iPhone unlocked and it works perfectly from the begining, I used T-Mobile account and have no problems with it.

Reviews.Title: Great product!
Reviews.Author: TaraP
Reviews.Content: Great product and easy to get everything setup the way we wanted it. No issues at all and exactly as advertised!

Reviews.Title: Dont buy Iphone any seller that not authorized by apple
Reviews.Author: Miguel Ruivo
Reviews.Content: This Iphone was an ilegal non authorised sold ...the seller must know that can not sell iphone unloked true or not?Now after more than a year this iphone was "We're sorry, but this is a serial number for a product that has been replaced" by apple and then i have no service from my phone!!! thanks seller

Reviews.Title: Report this seller!
Reviews.Author: Beth Skokowski
Reviews.Content: Forced to give them one star since Amazon will not let me give them zero stars.After less than 4 months the phone died and the restore function wouldn't work. When I took it to Apple for repair, they found third-party parts inside and some screws missing (it had also been purchased in 2011 and been used according to their records). They couldn't repair it or replace it because the non-Apple parts voided all warranties. Let this be a warning to anyone tempted to buy from them!

Reviews.Title: Aloha
Reviews.Author: Anh Huy Ha
Reviews.Content: it got it earlier than i expected. However, problem is i did not know why the pack have been broken. I just concern that someone has changed my iphone.

Reviews.Title: Wireovia sold me a stolen/lost iPhone
Reviews.Author: Lucas Vargas
Reviews.Content: I bought this iPhone 4 on June 2012; I was convinced that buying through Amazon was pretty safe. However, a friend of mine suggested me to verify that this phone was OK by using Apple's phone status system using the serial number. It turns out that they (Wireovia - Amazon) sold me a replaced phone; this basically means that this phone was either reported lost or stolen and then illegally sold. I think this is completely dishonest and  even fraudulent  not to say against the law. I don't know whether the seller will give my money back or not because of the fact that this was bought back on 2012, but what I do know is that I'll escalate this situation to whomever can resolve it at Amazon or even the law.

Reviews.Title: Just as promised
Reviews.Author: Karl Ward
Reviews.Content: Bought the iPhone as a gift for my wife, she loves it, I'm happy.  Unlocked phone cost more but it takes the chains off when it comes who you can use for a carrier.

Reviews.Title: fine
Reviews.Author: douglas rodriguez
Reviews.Content: fine very good excellent, the first buy for amazon and placer to meet. lost Price super sold and thanks ok

Reviews.Title: Working iPhone but it's missing parts
Reviews.Author: Clare Desplats
Reviews.Content: Product working but Sim card tray is missing.It was advertised without cables and charger which is ok.I was expecting the simcard tray since Apple can be very fussy about the "original" sim card tray.Except for this, the Phone is working very well. Screen is not scratched at all.

Reviews.Title: i love it
Reviews.Author: Lu
Reviews.Content: Excellent product, I really like, I am very pleased to have made ​​this purchase. Would you recommend others to buy it.

Reviews.Title: One of my best purchases
Reviews.Author: Jule74
Reviews.Content: I have received this product and I'm extremely satisfied. I received it in new condition with no scratches and it works great. So far I've had no problems and even figured out how to make my SIM card from StraightTalk work in the phone. It's awesome and I would definitely recommend purchases from this company. It also came with a lovely case that I wasn't expecting, so that was a very nice surprise. Thank you and have a successful day.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: P. Cool
Reviews.Content: I love the product but mostly I'm wild about the dealer.  It was exactly as described and more.  He went out of his way to get it to me in 4 days and did.  Will only use this dealer in the future whenever possible.

Reviews.Title: Great! Even it is not Iphone 5
Reviews.Author: RAYKARD M TEDTAOTAO
Reviews.Content: She had Iphone 3 but was broken because she didn't take care of it. Hopefully this will be for keeps.

Reviews.Title: great product

Reviews.Content: great phone my daughter love it. I got it a a gift for Christmas nd she love it.t game unlocked just as the seller stated.

Reviews.Title: Great product!

Reviews.Content: Product was advertized as brand new and it came completely sealed in a box... never been opened.  I have not had any issues with the iphone thus far.

Reviews.Title: Great iPhone!
Reviews.Author: Larry
Reviews.Content: This was a great purchase for the money.  No complaints, no issues with the iPhone at all.  The unlocked iPhone works great with any carrier.

Reviews.Title: really LOVE IT!!!!
Reviews.Author: alecor
Reviews.Content: I really liked it! it was unblocked, functioning....just perfect!everything was correct.thanks!IPHONE 4 16GB - Factory Unlocked -

Reviews.Title: i got this phone and it was used and locked.
Reviews.Author: Nigel elizee
Reviews.Content: so i ordered this phone for my gf for her bday. the iphone 4 looked good but i noticed a dent at the end of it but it looked new. now then when i put it on, i noticed that it has already been booted up, put my sim in and thats when it said its carrier locked to at&t; and also it had the persons name when i connected it on itunes. i was afraid that this was stolen and i still dont know if it is. i had to pay extra to unlock it. i really need this seller to contact me because im very disappointed of this drama i went through. i ordered a product from you where you deceived me telling me its brand new where its been used, you told me its unlocked where it was locked to at&t.;

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Maria Arsuaga
Reviews.Content: My Iphone, came a little bit out of time, but the phone actually works perfectly, I live in Mexico and its unblocked and its functioning just perfect.

Reviews.Title: PERFECT!
Reviews.Author: Sis
Reviews.Content: This phone came super fast. Had a delivery of May 30th-Jun6th, came June 1st! The phone was in perfect condition and only paid $260. Also, I received screen protectors, and a speaker thing to attach to my iphone. Great service, super fast!

Reviews.Title: Good
Reviews.Author: Ayhan
Reviews.Content: The phone has arrived factory unlock and all specs as it is written. I only did install my sim card and start using.

Reviews.Title: iOS 5 and iCloud eliminate the need for a tethered PC.
Reviews.Author: Ghenghis
Reviews.Content: I'm on my second week of Beta OS 5, and this should effectively kill all the silly complaining about what this phone "wont do." A night and day improvement, and not much need to jailbreak your phone anymore. All the details are on Apple's website, and according to most sources this new OS will be available to the general public this fall.Below is my review of the 16GB model that I purchased in September. Please note that this is strictly my opinion of the phone itself, I have no knowledge of this seller or the condition of the phones they sell. A word or advice however, if you're considering buying from this seller you need to contact them first to get details on the phone, warranty, and whats provided.I had the 8GB 3G model and thought that was great, until I got a demo of the iPhone 4. Man is this version is light years ahead of the original model.With a 1Ghz CPU, and 16GB of flash memory, this thing is a portable office/entertainment center par excellence. I've had this phone for 3 months without a single problem, the display is nice and sharp, the apps load very fast, and I now have over 130 apps to perform just about every duty you could possibly think of with absolutely no impact on performance. And on the AT&T; 3G network, I average download speeds of around 1.8Mbps, and over 1M upload speeds....and how do I know that, cause I got an app that tells me that's how. BTW, the display is the equivalent of a 960x640 on your desktop (double the 3G model) so what you see is essentially a high res yield and page loads are superfast. And resident memory, after a full days use I just checked and still had 120Mb of Ram available. On the 3G model that number was usually down around 4Mb by the end of the work day and had to be refreshed.I was in the design/manufacturing business for 20 years, and this is by far the most amazing piece of technology I have ever seen or imagined. Even the battery life is 3x better than the previous model, and thats a good thing cause its integrated but a full charge should yield and entire days work of calls, emails, surfing the web, SMS messaging, and play. I no longer need my laptop cause there's nothing I cant do with the iPhone, and that includes sending faxes, editing Excel or Word documents, and even printing. A flash for the 5MP camera, an HD video camera, and even real time video conferencing over a wireless network, and Bluetooth that unlike the 3G model is actually compatible with everything you throw at it, including Garmin GPS....just amazing. This thing even has 2 mics with noise suppression so calls are clearer on the other end. Man, Apple hit this one out of the park.BTW, with all the apps, music, and videos I've got loaded on this thing I've still got 10GB of flash memory remaining. I cant imagine why anybody would need more storage, and the 32GB model isn't any faster and doesn't have any more features. You'll need iTunes on your desktop to get the most out of this phone and iTunes can be a little intimidating at first but its worth the trouble, and all the instruction you need can be found on the web or Youtube for transferring photos, videos, music, apps, etc.Update 12/09/10: I've been reading up on the "antenna problem" with the iPhone 4G and have this to say.... It is easily cured by slapping on a hard case or shell on the phone, which eliminates the issue I see some people complaining about. I have personally never experienced this issue because I left the AT&T; store with a protective shell on my phone which virtually everybody I've ever seen with an iPhone has anyway. Very simply you CANNOT replicate the reported "death grip" problem with a shell or bumper around the outer frame. Cant be done. And BTW, I don't know if its due to network improvements or what but lately I'm getting 3Mbps+ download speeds so if anything I'm happier with my purchase now than I was 4 months ago. Zero complaints, and that's something most smartphone users of other OEM products can't say.A final word: Beware negative reviews scattered about Amazon that are filled with bad English and are authored by individuals who have written only one review (on the iPhone) and posted it in several locations on Amazon's site. Its easy to pick these out, and they have no doubt been written by the same person.Oh wait, I do have one complaint about the iPhone 4. Several times a month my girlfriend gets mad at me and hangs up in the middle of the conversation so I guess I'm suffering from this "dropped call" thing after all. haw haw

video recording, HD (720p) up to 30 frames per second with audio

VGA-quality photos and video at up to 30 frames per second with the front camera
Tap to focus video or still images ,960-by-640-pixel resolution at 326 ppi
3.5-inch (diagonal) widescreen Multi-Touch display
